title: We value your privacy
description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze how you use the app, and fix issues. You can accept all cookies, reject non-essential ones, or customize your preferences.
descriptionRenewal: We've updated our cookie policy with new features or services. Please review and confirm your preferences to continue with the best experience.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences. Enable or disable cookies by category or individually.

strict_necessary.title: Strictly Necessary
strict_necessary.description: Essential for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.

functional_performance.title: Functional & Performance
functional_performance.description: Help us improve by collecting anonymous usage data and error reports.

social_media_embedded.title: Social Media & Embedded Content
social_media_embedded.description: Enable social media features and embedded content from third parties.
